articles.content: Share price of . gained 1.43 per cent to Rs 224.0 at 12:12PM (IST) in Monday's trade. The counter hit a high of Rs 225.5 and low of Rs 221.1 so far during the session. The stock had closed at Rs 220.… [+1238 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Pakistan orders masks on domestic flights as COVID numbers rise
articles.description: Pakistan has had very few COVID cases over recent months and had done away with almost all precautions. But over the past 24 hours, the national COVID positivity ratio had risen to 2.85% with 382 positive cases and two deaths, according to data released on Mo…
articles.content:
Pakistan's aviation regulator has made masks mandatory on domestic flights given a gradual rise in the number of COVID-19 cases across the country, it said a statement.
The order comes a day after P… [+1029 chars]

articles.title: AP EAMCET 2022: Hall ticket releasing today on cets.apsche.ap.gov.in
articles.description: ​​Students are advised to keep their AP EAMCET application number ready as it would help them in downloading the admit cards. They can also refer to the step-by-step process given below on how to download these admit cards online.
articles.content:
Andhra Pradesh Engineering, Agriculture and Pharmacy Common Entrance Test, AP EAMCET 2022 Hall Ticket will be releasing today for all registered candidates.
